alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Hancock; Jones; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Baldwin, south central Putnam, west central Hancock and northeastern Jones Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 717 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Ethridge, or 10 miles west of Milledgeville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Midway-Hardwick, Meriwether, Ethridge, Plant Harlee Branch, Blountsville and Hardwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
